boardgame.name: El Valle de los Reyes: La Otra Vida
Valley of the Kings: Afterlife
boardgame.description: Description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Take on the role of Egyptian nobles at the time of the pharaohs, preparing for their death and burial in the valley of the kings. Using an innovative deck-building mechanism with a crumbling pyramid, players fill their tombs with jewelry, chambers, weapons, tomb art and other treasures. The player who collects the most valuable artifacts in their tomb wins the game!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Valley of the Kings: Afterlife is a standalone game that can also be combined with Valley of the Kings to allow for play with up to six players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

boardgame.boardgameintegration: Valley of the Kings: Last Rites
Valley of the Kings: Last Rites

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: In shrink. Also selling original game (played once). $4 shipping in U.S.

Shrinkwrapped and in stock Language: English Within The Netherlands € 4,- per shipment to a Kiala service point near you or € 6,75 per shipment for delivery at your doorstep. Shipment to Belgium by Kiala is € 7,50. Payment is possible by bank transfer or Paypal (costs +3%)

Brand New! VERY LIGHT DING/DENT (see http://www.rockinbgames.com/policies/damage-classifications for more information) A portion of the earnings from each sale are donated to St. Jude Children_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Research Hospital. Standard shipping to a USA address: $5.99

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5818) When you die, you can take it with you! Take on the role of Egyptian nobles at the time of the pharaohs, preparing for their death and burial in the Valley of the Kings. Using an innovative deck-building mechanic with a crumbling pyramid, players fill their tombs with jewelry, chambers, weapons, tomb art and other treasures. The player who collects the most valuable artifacts in their tomb wins the game!

Opened but un-played. Item is in very good condition. I treat my games very well. If there are components inside the game they are most likely bagged in 4mm, thick bags. I ship via USPS, which is most cost effective. When I ship things I take extra measurers to mitigate any potential shipping damage. Shipping from 98012. Here’s some shipping ESTIMATES to help you get an idea of what it will cost. Your distance from my Zip Code (98012) and box weight are the biggest factors in price. Please ask ahead of time if you want to know your shipping! If you place an order and cancel it after I provide you with shipping, you will get negative feedback. Small Card Game (i.e. 6 nimmt or Hanabi) $3-$6 / USPS First Class or Priority Bubble Mailer Thin Medium Sized (i.e. Concept, Las Vegas) $8-$10 / Priority Mail Thick Medium Sized (i.e. Istanbul, King of Tokyo, Russian Railroads) $10-$13 / Priority Mail Big Box Games (i.e. Ticket to Ride, 7 Wonders) $16-$18 / Priority Mail or Parcel Post Oversized or Odd Shaped Boxes ($22-$25) / Parcel Post
